T02mkarmviu:110: b) yathaivaṃvidhaṃ sthaṇḍilapratiṣṭhāpanam. tathā yuddhadarśanam. yatra bahavaḥ sattvā ghātyante hastyaśvamanuṣyādayaḥ. yuddhapratibaddhānāṃ ca śastrāṇām abhinandanam.
T02mkarmviu:111: c) yathā coktaṃ bhagavatā vaiśālyāṃ kālikasūtre. prāṇātipāta ānanda sevito
T02mkarmviu:113: bhavati. pretaviṣayasaṃvartanīyo 'pi bhavati. yasmād alpaprāṇātipātasya vipāko manuṣyabhūtasya sato alpāyuḥsaṃvartanīyo 'pi bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:114: d) tathā daśādīnavā nandikasūtra uktāḥ prāṇātipātasya.
T02mkarmviu:116: II. tatra katamat karma dīrghāyuḥsaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. prāṇātipātān
T02mkarmviu:119: bhītānāṃ sattvānām abhayapradānam (MKV 34) anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ madhye
T02mkarmviu:120: kāruṇyacittatā. glānānāṃ sattvānāṃ madhye maitracittatā. anyeṣāṃ ca bālavṛddhānām. teṣām eva bhojanapradānam. pratigrāhakeṣu ca maitracittatā.
T02mkarmviu:121: yat pūrvoktaṃ kuśalapakṣeṇa yuddhadarśanādi. tathā stūpacaityavihārāṇāṃ śīrṇānāṃ pratisaṃskaraṇam.
T02mkarmviu:122: akālamṛtyur na bhavet tasya yo bhagnaśīrṇaṃ pratisaṃskaroti.
T02mkarmviu:123: a) tathā bakapratyekabrahmasūtraṃ varṇayanti sma. tena kila ṛṣibhūtena
T02mkarmviu:124: pañcābhijñena tṛṣṇārtasya sārthasya pathabhraṣṭasya upari ṛddhyā varṣaṃ
T02mkarmviu:125: pātitam. tadarthaṃ ca bhagavatā gāthā bhāṣitā.
T02mkarmviu:126: tat te purāṇaṃ vrataśīlavṛttaṃ svapnād vibuddho 'ham iha smarāmi.
T02mkarmviu:129: eṇī nāma nadī yasyā anukūle rājā kaścid gṛhītaḥ pratyamitreṇa (MKV 35)
T02mkarmviu:130: himavantam anupraviśya sa nīyamāna eva vadhyaṃ prāptaḥ sabalavāhanaḥ. tena ṛṣibhūtena ṛddhyā vātavarṣaṃ muktam. sa copāyena pratyamitrajanakāyo
T02mkarmviu:132: tat te dvitīyaṃ vrataśīlavṛttaṃ svapnād vibuddho 'nusmarāmi.
T02mkarmviu:134: gaṅgāsrotasi nāvā gṛhītā nāgena ghoreṇa ṛddhikena.
T02mkarmviu:135: sa ca tadā ṛṣir gaṅgākūle maharddhikaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pratiśarati. tena ca kāyaḥ krandamāno jīvitena nirāśas tato mokṣitaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:136: tat te tṛtīyaṃ vrataśīlavṛttaṃ svapnād vibuddho 'nusmarāmi.
T02mkarmviu:137: tasyāṃ ca nāvāyāṃ nausvāmī bodhisattvas tena kālenābhūt. evaṃ vidhaṃ te
T02mkarmviu:139: b) yathā kecid ācāryāḥ kathayanti. bhagavān āha. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo jambudvīpe sarvajanapadamārī vartate sma. athānyatareṇa sattvenānyalokadhātau sthitena ṛddhimataḥ sakāśāc chrutam. yathā jambudvīpe sarvamārī pātiteti. tena kṛtapuṇyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam. (MKV
T02mkarmviu:140: 36) jambudvīpe upapadyāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vyādhipraṇāśāya jāyeyeti. sa
T02mkarmviu:141: tatropapannaḥ. ye ca sattvās tṛṣitās teṣāṃ pānīyena vyādhiṃ nāśayati. ye ca bubhukṣitās teṣāṃ bhaktena vyādhiṃ nāśayati. evaṃ yena yasyārthas
T02mkarmviu:142: tenaiva tasya vyādhiṃ nāśayati. na nāma tasya kiṃcid apy anauṣadhaṃ. yad yad eva gṛhya prayacchati tat tad evauṣadham. tasya jambudvīpakair manuṣyaiḥ sarvauṣadhir ekanāma kṛtam. atha bhikṣavaḥ sarvauṣadhivaidyarājo
T02mkarmviu:143: bahūnāṃ sattvasahasrāṇāṃ jīvitāni dattvā kālagataḥ. kālāntareṇa mithilāyāṃ rājakule upapannaḥ. tato 'pi tena mahādevabhūtena aśītikṣatriyasahasrāṇi
T02mkarmviu:144: dharmadeśanayā pravrajitāni. jambudvīpe 'śītivarṣasahasrāṇi manuṣyāṇām āyur na parikṣīṇam. tataś cyutaḥ kālāntareṇa kuśīnagaryāṃ māndhātā saṃvṛttaḥ. bhūyaś ca saptasūryopadeśe (MKV 37) sunetro nāma mānavo
T02mkarmviu:145: vijñeyaḥ. ahaṃ sa bhikṣavas tena kālena sarvauṣadhivaidyarājo 'bhūt. tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahādevasyāyuḥpramāṇaṃ yojayitavyam. māndhātṛsunetrābhyām apy evāyuḥpramāṇaṃ yojayitavyam. idaṃ karma dīrghāyuḥsaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:146: III. katamat karma bahvābādhāsaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. khaṭacapeṭapradānam.
T02mkarmviu:147: khaṭacapeṭapradānasyānumodanam. khaṭacapeṭapradānasya varṇavāditā. teṣāṃ pradānena tuṣṭiḥ. mātāpitroś cittaśarīre pīḍākaraṇaṃ tathānyeṣāṃ pravrajitānāṃ śīlavatāṃ cittasaṃkleśaḥ. amitravyādhinā tuṣṭiḥ.
T02mkarmviu:150: IV. katamat karma alpābādhāsaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. khaṭacapeṭapradānān
T02mkarmviu:151: nivṛttiḥ. tatra samādāpanam. tadvarṇavāditā. tadabhyanumodanam. glānānāṃ mātāpitṝṇām upasthānakaraṇam. tad apy anyeṣāṃ gṛhasthapravrajitānām.
T02mkarmviu:153: bhaiṣajyapradānam. parijīrṇabhojanaṃ ca. idaṃ karma alpābādhāsaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:154: V. katamat karma durvarṇasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. krodhaḥ. upanāhaḥ mrakṣaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:156: gṛhasthapravrajitānāṃ bālavṛddhānām. stūpāṅgaṇacaityagṛhavihārāṇāṃ ca bhūmer aviśodhanam. stūpānāṃ pratimāṇāṃ ca dīpavyucchedaḥ. durvarṇānāṃ sattvānām avahasanam. tathā caukṣasamudācāratā. idaṃ karma durvarṇasaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:157: VI. katamat karma prāsādikasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. akrodhaḥ. anupanāhaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:158: amrakṣaḥ. vastrapradānam. stūpacaityagṛheṣu ca sudhādānam. suvarṇapātra
T02mkarmviu:160: āryāṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ varṇavāditā stūpāṅgaṇavihārāṇāṃ saṃmārjanam. satataṃ
T02mkarmviu:163: a) yathā āryasundaranandena kila krakucchande samyaksaṃbuddhe bhikṣusaṃghe
T02mkarmviu:164: jentākasnānaṃ kṛtam. tāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ prasāditam. bhūyaś ca suvarṇena
T02mkarmviu:165: haritālena pratyekabuddhastūpe lepo dattaḥ. idam api dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ
T02mkarmviu:166: prasāditam. abhirūpatāyāṃ ca pariṇāmitam. bhūyaś ca stūpe kriyamāṇe prathamaṃ chattraṃ kāritam. yathā paścimabhave sa eva vyākaroti.
T02mkarmviu:167: jentākasya ca snānena haritālasya lepanena ca ekacchattrapradānāc ca prāptā me suvarṇavarṇatā.
T02mkarmviu:169: VII. katamat karma alpeśākhyasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. īrṣyā. mātsaryam.
T02mkarmviu:170: parasya lābhenātuṣṭiḥ. parasya varṇavāditāyā atuṣṭiḥ. mātāpitroḥ
T02mkarmviu:173: bodhicittotpādasya nivāraṇam. tadabhyanumodanam. idaṃ karma alpeśākhyasaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:174: VIII. katamat karma maheśākhyasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. anīrṣyā. amātsaryam.
T02mkarmviu:175: paralābhena tuṣṭiḥ. parasya yaśovarṇaśabdaślokaśravaṇena tuṣṭiḥ. parasya varṇavāditāyā āttamanaskatā. bhagavataś caityastūpakārāpaṇam. hīne dharmahīne 'kuśalamūle nivāraṇam. maheśākhyakuśalamūle samādāpanam.
T02mkarmviu:177: a) yathoktaṃ bhagavatā vārāṇasyāṃ pūrvāparāntake sūtre (MKV 40) 'jitasya
T02mkarmviu:178: bodhisattvasya samuttejanaṃ kṛtam. mahate khalu te 'jita autsukyāya cittaṃ damayati. yad idaṃ saṃghaparihāpaṇāya. vakṣyatehi.
T02mkarmviu:179: maitreyas tuṣitasurālayādhivāsī prāptavyā divi bhuvi ceha yena pūjā sa śrīmān daśabalatām avāpya śīghraṃ lokānāṃ bhavatu śaśīva nityapūjyaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:181: IX. katamat karma nīcakulasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. stabdhatā. abhimānitā ca.
T02mkarmviu:183: mātāpitror apratyupasthānam. āryāṇāṃ śīlavatām apratyupasthānam. anyeṣāṃ ca gurusthānīyānām ācāryopādhyāyānām apratyupasthānam. nīcakulānāṃ satvānāṃ paribhavaḥ. idaṃ karma nīcakulasaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:184: X. katamat karma uccakulasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. astabdhatā. anabhimānitā.
T02mkarmviu:186: pratyupasthānam. āryāṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ pratyupasthānam. anyeṣāṃ ca gurusthānīyānām ācāryopādhyāyānāṃ pratyupasthānam. nīcakulānāṃ satvānām aparibhavaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:187: a) yathā ca bhagavatā sūtra uktam. yato bhikṣavaḥ kuśalaśīlavanto
T02mkarmviu:188: brahmacārinaḥ kalyāṇadharmāṇaḥ pravrajitā upasaṃkramanti pañca tasmin kule
T02mkarmviu:189: 'nuśaṃsāḥ pratyanuśaṃsitavyāḥ. katame pañca. iha bhikṣavaḥ upasaṃkrānteṣu
T02mkarmviu:190: śīlavatsu cittāni prasādayanti svargasaṃvartanīyaṃ (MKV 41) tad bhikṣavaḥ kulaṃ tasmin samaye pratipadaṃ pratipannaṃ bhavati. punar aparaṃ bhikṣavaḥ
T02mkarmviu:192: uccakulasaṃvartanīyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ. tasmin samaye pratipadaṃ pratipannaṃ
T02mkarmviu:193: bhavati. evaṃ sarvasūtraṃ yojyam. idaṃ karma uccakulasaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:194: XI. katamat karma alpabhogasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. adattādānam.
T02mkarmviu:197: parasya lābhenātuṣṭiḥ. paralābhāntarāyakriyā durbhikṣābhinandanaṃ ca. idaṃ karma alpabhogasaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:198: XII. tatra katamat karma mahābhogasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. adattādānān nivṛttiḥ pareṣāṃ cādattādānān nivāraṇam. pareṣām adattādānanivṛttānāṃ samanumodanam. mātāpitror vṛttipradānam. āryāṇāṃ ca śīlavatāṃ
T02mkarmviu:202: a) tad eva sūtraṃ yojyam. punar aparaṃ bhikṣavaḥ upasaṃkrānteṣu śīlavatsu dānāni dadanti puṇyāni ca kurvanti. mahābhogasaṃvartanīyaṃ bhikṣavas tat
T02mkarmviu:203: kulaṃ tasmin samaye pratipadaṃ pratipannaṃ bhavati. idaṃ karma mahābhogasaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:204: XIII. tatra katamat karma duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. ihaikatyo na parān pṛcchati. paṇḍitān. śramaṇān. brāhmaṇān. ko dharmaḥ kiṃ dharmaṃ kurvataḥ śreyaskaram iti. api tu duṣprajñān sevati. paṇḍitān
T02mkarmviu:206: saddharmabhāṇakānāṃ vaiśāradyopacchedaṃ karoti. saddharmabhāṇakānām abhiniveśena na sādhukāraṃ dadāti. asaddharmabhāṇakānāṃ (MKV 42)
T02mkarmviu:207: sādhukāraṃ dadāti. mithyādṛṣṭiṃ varṇayati. samyagdṛṣṭiṃ vigarhati. tathā pustakalekhakavācakānāṃ vṛttyupacchedaṃ karoti.
T02mkarmviu:208: a) sūtre coktam. unmattakasaṃvartanīyam ... karoti. saṃmūḍhakaś ca kālaṃ
T02mkarmviu:209: karoti. duṣprajñaś ca bhavati. yathoktaṃ nandikasūtre. pañcatriṃśad ādīnavāḥ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthāne yojayitavyāḥ. buddhe cāgauravo bhavati. dharme saṃghe cāgauravo bhavati. ataḥ śākyasūtraṃ yojayitavyam.
T02mkarmviu:210: yadā ca bhagavān kapilavastum āgataḥ sa madyapānadoṣān na kadācid bhagavantam upasaṃkrāntaḥ. caturbhiḥ sthavirair bhagavatā preṣitair gatvā vinītaḥ kālagataś ca. śākyaḥ pṛcchati. bhagavan. tasya kā gatir iti.
T02mkarmviu:211: bhagavān āha. ime 'pi ca me śākya bhāṣitasyārtham ājānīyur iti sūtraṃ (MKV
T02mkarmviu:212: 43) yojayitavyam. yathā cūḍā panthako nāma bhikṣus tasya rājagṛhe prativasato bhagavatā gāthoddiṣṭā. sā ca varṣātyayena na śakitā grahītum.
T02mkarmviu:213: bhikṣavo vismayaṃ prāptāḥ pṛcchanti. bhagavan kasyaiṣa karmaṇo vipākena
T02mkarmviu:214: duṣprajñaḥ. bhagavān āha. kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe parinirvṛte eṣa āraṇyako bhikṣus tripiṭakas tatkālam abhūt. bhikṣūṇāṃ ca buddhapūjām akurvatāṃ buddhavacanam antarhitam. te bhikṣavas tasya samīpaṃ gatāḥ asmākaṃ
T02mkarmviu:215: buddhavacanam antarhitam. asmākam apy upadeśaṃ kuruṣvety anena mātsaryadoṣāt teṣām upadeśo na kṛtaḥ. evaṃ tacchāsanam antarhitam. tasya karmaṇo vipākenaiṣa duṣprajñaḥ. idaṃ karma duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:216: XIV. tatra katamat karma mahāprajñasaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. (MKV 44)
T02mkarmviu:217: ihaikatyaḥ paripṛcchaka jātīyo bhavati paṇḍitāñ chramaṇān brāhmaṇān sevate duṣprajñān parivarjayati. saddharmaṃ dīpayati. asaddharmaṃ vigarhati dharmabhāṇakānāṃ vaiśāradyaṃ varṇayati. sahitabhāṣiṇāṃ sādhukāraṃ dadāti.
T02mkarmviu:218: ahitabhāṣiṇaṃ pariharati. samyagdṛṣṭiṃ varṇayati. mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vigarhati.
T02mkarmviu:219: masīpustakalekhanīpradānāni dadāti. na ca madyaṃ pibati. yathoktaṃ ca nandikasūtre. pañcatriṃśad madyapānadoṣā akuśalapakṣeṇa yojayitavyāḥ. idaṃ karma mahāprajñasaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:220: XV. tatra katamat karma narakopapattisaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. tīvraṃ praduṣṭacittasya kāyavāṅmanoduścaritam. ucchedadṛṣṭiḥ. śāśvatadṛṣṭiḥ.
T02mkarmviu:221: nāstikadṛṣṭiḥ. akriyādṛṣṭiḥ. matsarivādaḥ. akṛtajñatā. ānantaryam. āryāṇāṃ śīlavatām abhūtābhyākhyānadānam. idaṃ karma narakopapattisaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:222: XVI. tatra katamat karma tiryagyonyupapattisaṃvartanīyam. ucyate.
T02mkarmviu:223: madhyamaṃ kāyavāṅmanoduścaritaṃ vicitraṃ rāgasamutthitaṃ karma vicitraṃ dveṣasamutthitaṃ karma vicitraṃ mohasamutthitaṃ karma. mātāpitroḥ pravrajitānāṃ cākalpikapradānam. tiryagyonigatānāṃ satvānām avahasanam.
T02mkarmviu:224: tathā praṇidhānakarma yathā govratikakukkuravratikaprabhṛtīnāṃ praṇidhānam atropapadyeyam
T02mkarmviu:225: a) yathā ca bodhisatvasya siṃha jātake 'vadānaṃ vaktavyam. yathā ca varṣākārasya brāhmaṇasya markaṭopapattiḥ. tadyathā (MKV 45) varṣākāreṇa brāhmaṇena sthaviramahākāśyapo bhikṣū rājagṛhasyoparimeṇa gṛdhrakūṭāt
T02mkarmviu:226: parvatād ṛṣigiripārśvaṃ vihāyasā gacchan dṛṣṭaḥ. tena praduṣṭacittena devadattājātaśatrusaṃsargād vāgduścaritaṃ kṛtam. eṣa śramaṇo vihāyasā
T02mkarmviu:227: gacchan parvatāt parvataṃ gacchati. tadyathā markaṭo vṛkṣād vṛkṣam eva.
T02mkarmviu:228: bhagavataḥ kathitam. varṣākāreṇa brāhmaṇena krodhajātena vāgduścaritaṃ
T02mkarmviu:229: kṛtam. tasya ko vipākaḥ. bhagavān āha. asya vāgduścaritasya vipākato
T02mkarmviu:230: varṣākāro brāhmaṇaḥ pañca janmāntaraśatāni markaṭo bhaviṣyatīti. tatas tena varṣākāreṇa śrutaṃ bhagavatā nirdiṣṭatvaṃ kila pañca janmāntaraśatāni
T02mkarmviu:231: markaṭo bhaviṣyatīti. sa saṃvignacittaṃ prasāditavān. tena bhagavān parinirvāṇakāle pṛṣṭaḥ. tasya karmaṇaḥ kadā parikṣaya iti. bhagavān āha.
T02mkarmviu:232: tāny eva pañca janmāntaraśatāni kiṃ tu rājagṛhe utpatsyase yathā jambvā jambudvīpe jāyate. yatroṣṭrikāmātrāṇi phalāni. yathā kṣaudramadhv aneḍakam
T02mkarmviu:233: evamāsvādāni. (MKV 46) tatropapattir bhaviṣyati. tato vyutthitasya te
T02mkarmviu:234: sugatir bhaviṣyati. yathā cittapradūṣaṇena siṃheṣūpapannaḥ. tadarthaṃ ca bhagavatā gāthā
T02mkarmviu:235: dīrghā jāgarato rātrir dīrghaṃ śrāntasya yojanam dīrgho bālasya saṃsāraḥ saddharmam avijānataḥ.
T02mkarmviu:237: XVII. tatra katamat karma yamalokopapattisaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. kruddhasya pratihatacittasya kāyavāṅmanoduścaritam. lobho viṣamalobho mithyājīvo
T02mkarmviu:238: jighāṃsitapipāsitasya kruddhasya kālakriyā. vastuṣv abhiṣaktacittasya kālakriyā.
T02mkarmviu:239: a) yathā coktaṃ bhagavatā śatavarge āgame karmavibhaṅgasūtre. (MKV 47)
T02mkarmviu:240: tasya khalu punar ānanda pudgalasyānyajātikṛtaṃ vā karma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati. maraṇakāle vā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ. idaṃ karma yamalokopapattisaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:246: XIX. tatra katamat karma manuṣyalokopapattisaṃvartanīyam. ucyate.
T02mkarmviu:247: subhāvitā mandabhāvitāś ca daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ. katame daśa.
T02mkarmviu:248: trividhaṃ kāyakarma. caturvidhaṃ vākkarma. trividhaṃ manaḥkarma. idaṃ karma manuṣyalokopapattisaṃvartanīyam.
T02mkarmviu:249: XX. tatra katamat karma kāmāvacaradevopapattisaṃvartanīyam. ucyate.

T02mkarmviu:271: XXVII. tatra katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo narakeṣūpapannaḥ paripūrṇaṃ nairayikam āyuḥ kṣapayitvā cyavati. ucyate. (MKV 49)

T02mkarmviu:278: XXIX. tatra katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo narakeṣūpapannamātra eva cyavati. ucyate. ihaikatyena nārakīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitaṃ
T02mkarmviu:279: ca. sa tat kṛtvāstīryati. jihrīyati. vigarhati vijugupsati ācaṣṭe.
T02mkarmviu:280: deśayati. vyaktīkaroti. āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadyate. na punaḥ kurute. sa cen narakeṣūpapadyate upapannamātra eva cyavati.

T02mkarmviu:285: cyavati. idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo narakeṣūpapannamātra eva
T02mkarmviu:287: XXX. tatra katamat karma niyatopapattisaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. yat kṛtvā kvacid upapattau pariṇāmayati amutropapadyeyam iti. sa tatropapadyate.

T02mkarmviu:290: XXXI. tatra katamat karmāniyatopapattisaṃvartanīyam. ucyate. yat kṛtvā na

T02mkarmviu:292: XXXII. tatra katamat karma deśāntaravipākam ucyate. yat karma tasminn eva janmāntare vā deśāntaragatasya vipacyate śubham aśubhaṃ vā. tat karma deśāntaravipākam. yathā bhagavān kathayati. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo jambudvīpe manuṣyāṇam aparimāṇam āyur bhavati. yathā rājño māndhātuḥ.
T02mkarmviu:293: athānyatarasmin nagare maitrāyajño nāma (MKV 51) sārthavāhaputro babhūva.
T02mkarmviu:294: sa pañcaśatasahāyaparivṛta udyānaṃ gataḥ. taiś ca sahāyair uktaḥ. asmin nagare baṇijas tava pitaraṃ pūrvaṅgamaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrya
T02mkarmviu:295: suvarṇabhūmiprabhṛtīni deśāntarāṇi gatvā dvīpāntarāṇi ca paśyanti.
T02mkarmviu:296: dravyopārjanaṃ ca kurvanti. vayam api tvāṃ pūrvaṅgamaṃ kṛtvā samudram
T02mkarmviu:297: avatīrya dravyopārjanaṃ kariṣyāmo dvīpāntarāṇi ca drakṣyāmaḥ. tatas tena evam iti pratiśrutam. sa rātrau gatvā mātaram āpṛcchati. amba suvarṇabhūmiṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ. tasya mātāha. aparimāṇaṃ putra dravyaṃ gṛhe
T02mkarmviu:298: tiṣṭhati. na gantavyam iti. sa mātur vacanena nivṛttaḥ. sa bhūya udyānaṃ
T02mkarmviu:299: gataḥ sahāyair uktaḥ. tam arthaṃ vijñāpayāmaḥ. tena tathāstv iti
T02mkarmviu:300: pratiśrutam. sa bhūyo mātaraṃ gatvāpṛcchati. bhūyaś ca mātrā pādapatanān
T02mkarmviu:301: nivartitaḥ. evaṃ tṛtīyam api. sa kālāntareṇa bhūya (MKV 52) udyānaṃ gatvā sahāyair uktaḥ. tava doṣād vayam api na gacchāmaḥ. pṛcchāmo vayam.
T02mkarmviu:302: trayodaśyāṃ gamiṣyāma iti. tena mātur aviditam eva bahir bahu bhāṇḍaṃ
T02mkarmviu:303: nirgamitam. tasya gamanakāle prasthitasya mātā dvāre pādapatanaṃ kṛtvā
T02mkarmviu:304: sthitvā. putra na gantavyam iti. sa kruddho mātuḥ pādaṃ mastake dattvātikrāntaḥ samudrakūlaṃ ca gataḥ. tena sahāyā uktāḥ. samudram avataratāṃ na jñāyate jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ ca. vayaṃ sarva evāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ poṣadhaṃ gṛhṇāmaḥ. tais tathāstv iti pratipannam.
T02mkarmviu:305: poṣadhaṃ ca gṛhītam. te samudram avatīrṇāḥ. samudramadhyagatānāṃ ca teṣāṃ
T02mkarmviu:306: viṣamavātādyāhataḥ poto vinaṣṭas tena sarve kālagatāḥ. maitrāyajñaś ca ma.
T02mkarmviu:307: praṭamukhyān avabaddhaṃ tāmraghataṃ ca gṛhya samudrakūla uttīrṇaḥ sa paryaṭamānaḥ sauvarṇaprākāraṃ nagaraṃ paśyati. ārāmasaṃpannaṃ vanasaṃpannaṃ puṣkariṇīsaṃpannam. dhūpitadhūpanaṃ muktapuṣpāvakīrṇam avasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam. tataś catasro 'psaraso nirgatāḥ. sa tābhir gṛhya
T02mkarmviu:308: nagaraṃ praveśitaḥ. sa tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bahūni varṣāṇi krīḍitavān. bahūni
T02mkarmviu:309: varṣaśatāni. bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi krīḍitavān.
T02mkarmviu:310: sa tābhir uktaḥ. āryaputra tavāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo 'pūrvaḥ. asmākam aviditaṃ na nirgantavyam. yadi nirgacchasi sarvathottarābhimukhena na
T02mkarmviu:311: gantavyam. iti. sa tasmāt kālāntareṇa nirgataḥ. sa bhūyo gacchan nagaraṃ
T02mkarmviu:312: paśyati. rūpyamayena prākāreṇa. ārāmasaṃpannaṃ vanasaṃpannam. pūrvavad
T02mkarmviu:313: yāvat. tasmād apy aṣṭāv apsaraso nirgatāḥ. tābhir apy asau gṛhya
T02mkarmviu:314: praveśitaḥ. sa tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bahūni varṣāṇi krīḍitavān. bahūni
T02mkarmviu:315: varṣaśatāni. bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi krīḍitavān.
T02mkarmviu:316: pūrvavat. tato 'pi kālāntareṇa nirgataḥ. bhūyaś ca paryaṭan nagaraṃ
T02mkarmviu:319: avasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam. tasmād api ṣoḍaśāpsaraso nirgatāḥ. tābhir api sārdhaṃ bahūni varṣāṇi krīḍitavān. pūrvavat. sa tābhir uktaḥ. āryaputra tavāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo 'pūrvaḥ. asmād vihārāt tena na nirgantavyam. atha
T02mkarmviu:320: nirgacchasi. sarvathottarāmukhena na gantavyam iti. sa tasmāt kālāntareṇa
T02mkarmviu:322: tathaivārāmasaṃpannam. vanasaṃpannaṃ puṣkariṇīsaṃpannam. dhūpitadhūpanaṃ muktapuṣpāvakīrṇam avasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam. tasmād api dvātriṃśad
T02mkarmviu:323: apsaraso nirgatāḥ. tābhir api sārdhaṃ bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi krīḍitavān. sa tābhir apy uktaḥ. āryaputra tavāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo 'pūrvaḥ. asmād vihārāt tena na nirgantavyam. atha
T02mkarmviu:324: nirgacchasi. uttarāmukhena na gantavyam iti. sa tāsāṃ pramādād ratikhinno
T02mkarmviu:325: nirgataḥ. uttarābhimukhena gacchan kaṇṭakāṭavīṃ prapannaḥ. atha kṛṣṇāyasena prākāreṇa nagaraṃ paśyati. sa tatra praviṣṭaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:326: praviṣṭamātrasya ca nagaradvāraṃ pihitam. ūrdhvaṃ paśyati. prākāro vardhate bhairavaṃ ca śabdaṃ śṛṇoti. tatrasthaś ca cintayati. kim etad iti. sa tatra gataḥ. atha paśyati puruṣasyāsidharaṃ cakraṃ śiraś chinatti.
T02mkarmviu:327: sa bhītaḥ pṛcchati. kim etad bho puruṣa. nairayikapuruṣaḥ prāha. eṣa
T02mkarmviu:328: pratyekanarakaḥ. maitrāyajña āha. kiṃ tvayā pāpakarma kṛtam iti. sa
T02mkarmviu:329: kathayati. asmin jambudvīpe mahākośalī nāma nagaram. tatrāhaṃ mahāsārthavāhaputro 'bhūvam. sa pañcabhiḥ sahāyaśataiḥ sahodyānaṃ gataḥ.
T02mkarmviu:330: te kathayanti. tava pitā sārthavāho 'smākaṃ pūrvapuruṣo 'sti. pūrvaṅgamaṃ kṛtvā deśāntarāṇi gatvā dravyopārjanāni kurvanti. suvarṇabhūmiṃ siṃhaladvīpaṃ ca prabhṛtīni ca dvīpāntarāṇi paśyanti. vayam api tvayā
T02mkarmviu:331: pūrvaṅgamena deśāntaraṃ paśyāma iti. vayam api gacchāma iti pratiśrutam.
T02mkarmviu:332: so 'haṃ gṛhaṃ gatvā mātaram āpṛṣṭavān. aham evaṃ deśāntaraṃ gamiṣyāmīti.
T02mkarmviu:333: mātā ma āha. putra tava pitā samudram avatīrṇo deśāntaraṃ gata eva kālagataḥ. tvam ekaputrakaḥ. prabhūtaṃ gṛhe dravyaṃ tiṣṭhati. na
T02mkarmviu:334: gantavyam. iti. mayā na gacchāmīti pratiśrutam. evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ
T02mkarmviu:335: caturtham apy āpādapatanaṃ nivartitaḥ. kālāntareṇāhaṃ bhūyo 'py udyānaṃ gataḥ sahāyair uktaḥ. avaśyaṃ gantavyam iti. gamiṣyāmīti mayā pratiśrutam.
T02mkarmviu:336: atha mama prasthitasya mātā dvāre pādapatanaṃ kṛtvā sthitā. putra nārhasi māṃ parityaktum iti. tasyāhaṃ mastake pādaṃ dattvā prakrāntaḥ. so 'haṃ
T02mkarmviu:337: pañcabhiḥ sahāyaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ samudrakūlaṃ gataḥ. aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ poṣadhaṃ gṛhya samudram avatīrṇaḥ. suvarṇabhūmiprasthitānām asmākaṃ viṣamavātādyāhataḥ poto vinaṣṭaḥ. te sarve kālagatāḥ. ahaṃ tu bahubhir

T02mkarmviu:347: adyāgamiṣyati. etad eva karma kṛtveti. maitrāyajña āha. kiṃ bhojanam. sa
T02mkarmviu:348: āha. ata eva mastakāc chidyamānād yat pūyaśoṇitaṃ sravati. evam uktvā sa
T02mkarmviu:349: puruṣaḥ kālagataḥ patitaḥ. maitrāyajño bhītaḥ saṃvignaḥ. sarveṇa bhāvena mātāpitroḥ praṇipātaṃ
T02mkarmviu:350: ūrdhvaṃ bhavāgravitatān adharād avīciṃ tiryakprathān agaṇitān api lokadhātūn ātmansva surāsuranaroragabhūtakāye satvāni yāni upagatāni sukhino bhavantu
T02mkarmviu:351: evaṃ cintayitvā sarveṇa bhāvena mātāpitror namaskāraṃ kṛtvā praṇipātaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtavān. yatra yatropapadyāmi mātāpitroḥ śuśrūṣāṃ kuryām aham iti. ye ca kecana satvā pratyekanarake upapadyante teṣāṃ sarveṣām arthāyāham atrāvasthitaḥ. ye ca kecana loke yuktāś ca muktāś ca teṣāṃ
T02mkarmviu:352: namaḥ. te māṃ pālayantu. idam uktvā tasmin nairayikapuruṣaḥ kāle sthitaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:353: punaś ca praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā punar apy āha.
T02mkarmviu:354: kṛtvādau narakam avīcim ābhavāgrād ye satvāś cyutigatibandhanāvabaddhāḥ te sarve sukham atināpya dharmayuktaṃ nirvāṇaṃ yad ajaram acyutaṃ spṛśantu.
T02mkarmviu:355: atha tac cakram aspṛśamānaṃ śirasi nityakālam evopari vihāyasi sthitam.
T02mkarmviu:356: nityaṃ ca kila tasya mātāśiṣaṃ prayuṅkte. yady asti mama kiṃcit puṇyaphalaṃ pradānena vā śīlena vā brahmacaryeṇa vā pativratatvena vā tena puṇyaphalena mama putrasya yatra tatra sthitasya mā kiṃcit pāpaṃ bhavatu.
T02mkarmviu:358: b) yathā śyāmajātake saviṣeṇa śareṇa ... śyāmakumārasya mātāpitror āśīrvacanena śalyaś ca nirgato viṣaṃ ca naṣṭaṃ mṛtaś ca saṃjīvitas tadvat tasyāpi śivam āsīt. yathā vajrarājagṛhe dhanaṃjayasūtre
T02mkarmviu:359: āryaśāradvatīputreṇoktam. tam enaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ mātāpitarau samaṃ mānitau
T02mkarmviu:360: samyak pūjitau kalyāṇena manasānukampete. (MKV 56) adhosī vatana putro

T02mkarmviu:364: c) sa tatra prītyāhāraḥ sthitvā paripūrṇeṣu ṣaṣṭivarṣasahasreṣu kālagataḥ.
T02mkarmviu:365: d) yathā rājājātaśatrur aparipūrṇa eva nairayikāyuḥpramāṇe cyutaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:366: abandhyatvāt karmaṇāṃ kadācid atīva śirorujā bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:367: e) atra kṛtapraṇidhānasya maitrāyajñasya mātāpitṛśuśrūṣā vaktavyā. yathā śyāmajātake 'ndhau mātāpitarau hastibhūtena paripālitau. anyeṣu jātakaśateṣu ca.
T02mkarmviu:368: f) atha bhagavān prāptakālaṃ bhikṣūn āmantrayate. syād evaṃ bhikṣavo
T02mkarmviu:369: yuṣmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena maitrāyajño nāma sārthavāhaputro babhūveti. naivaṃ draṣṭavyam. ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena maitrāyajño nāma sārthavāhaputra āsīt. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo mama vacanaṃ śraddadhānair buddhe sagauravair bhavitavyaṃ dharme saṃghe sagauravair bhavitavyam. mātāpitṛṣu ācāryopādhyāyeṣu sagauravair
T02mkarmviu:370: bhavitavyam. evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam. ya evaṃ deśāntaragataḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavati. (MKV 57) yathā maitrāyajñena deśāntaragatena
T02mkarmviu:371: tasminn eva janmani pratyekasvargaṃ pratyekanarakaṃ cānubhūtam. ya evaṃ deśāntaragataḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavati. idaṃ karma deśāntaravipākam.
T02mkarmviu:372: g) etad darśayati bhagavān. yathā mayi tathā mātāpitṛṣu. ācāryopādhyāyeṣu vacanakāriṇāṃ samo vipākaḥ iha loke paraloke ca. katham iha loke samaḥ karmavipāko bhavati. yathā śrāvastyāṃ daridrapuruṣo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhuñjānaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ prasāditavān. tena mahāpuṇyasaṃbhāra upārjitaḥ rājyasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtam. tad eva ca
T02mkarmviu:373: mokṣabījam. tac ca jñātvā bhagavatā gāthā bhāṣitā.
T02mkarmviu:374: ye tatrābhyanumodante vaiyāvṛtyakarāś ca ye anūnā dakṣiṇā teṣāṃ te 'pi puṇyasya bhāginaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:376: manaḥpūrvaṅgamā dharmā manaḥśreṣṭhā manojavāḥ manasā cet prasannena bhāṣate vākaroti vā tatas taṃ sukham anveti chāyā vā anuyāyinī.
T02mkarmviu:377: tataś cyutaś ca deveṣūpapannaḥ. yathā ca tagaraśikhī nāma pratyekabuddhaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:378: durbhikṣe daridrapuruṣeṇa sūpaḥ pratipāditaḥ. sa ca tadahar eva tasmin nagare rājābhiṣiktaḥ. tataḥ kālāntareṇa pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. ya eṣa sūtrantare paripaṭhitaḥ pratyekabuddhas (MKV 58) tagaraśikhī nāma. evaṃ tāvad bhagavati sāṃdṛṣṭikaś cittaprasādasya phalavipākaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:379: h) kathaṃ mātāpitṛṣu. yathā maitrāyajñaḥ sārthavāhaputraḥ ācaturthaṃ pratinivṛtto mātur vacanena caturṣu mahānagareṣu pratyekasvargasukham
T02mkarmviu:380: anubhūtavān. tat tu tasya mokṣabījam. evaṃ mātāpitṛṣv api sāṃdṛṣṭikaḥ
T02mkarmviu:382: i) kathaṃ bhagavati mātāpitṛṣu ca cittapradoṣeṇa narakagamanaṃ bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:383: ucyate. devadatto bhagavati cittaṃ pra ... to 'vīcau mahānarake patitaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:384: tathā sindhu viṣaye raurukaṃ nāma nagaram. tatra śikhaṇḍī rājaputraḥ
T02mkarmviu:385: pitaraṃ ghātayitvā narake patitaḥ. evaṃ bhagavati mātāpitṛṣu ca cittapradūṣaṇena narakagamanaṃ
T02mkarmviu:386: j) tena kāraṇena kiṃ nāsti nānākaraṇam. ucyate. mahāntaṃ nānākaraṇam.
T02mkarmviu:387: bhagavān anekakalpaśatasahasropārjitakuśalamūlasaṃbhūtasaṃbhāraḥ anutpannasya mārgasyotpādayitā buddho bodhāya mārgaṃ deśayati. tasmin kṛtaḥ prasādo 'prameyaphalavipākaḥ ante ca nirvāṇam. mātāpitror mokṣamārgo 'viditaḥ. api ca na sarvaṃ mātāpitror vacanaṃ kāryam. santi kecin mithyādarśanopahatacittāḥ putrān bruvanti. ehi mām avasanaṃ naya. tava ca bhaviṣyati hitāya (MKV 59) sukhāya mama ca. [prapāte māṃ pā]tayāgnau vā
T02mkarmviu:388: praveśayeti. tan naiva kartavyam. kiṃ kāraṇam. mātāpitarau ghātayitvāvaśyaṃ narakagamanam. ata eva bhagavatā pratiṣiddho na mātāpitṛghātakaḥ pravrājayitavyaḥ nāsti tasya pravrajyā nopasaṃpadā. nāsti
T02mkarmviu:390: ācāryopādhyāyāḥ. kathaṃ ca samasamā. nanu bhagavatoktam. mātāpitroḥ putrasneho yāvad asthimajjām āśritya tiṣṭhaty ata eva mātāpitṛbhyām
T02mkarmviu:391: ananujñātasya nāsti pravrajyā. yathāryarāṣṭrapālaśoṇaprabhṛtayo bhagavatā mātāpitarāv ananujñāpya na pravrājitāḥ. adyāpi tān ananujñātān na
T02mkarmviu:392: pravrājayanti. yathā ca bhagavati pravrajite śuddhodanasya putraśokena
T02mkarmviu:393: cakṣuṣī antarhite. ucyate. mātāpitaraḥ pañca sthānāni pratyāśaṃsamānāḥ putram icchanti. śaṃvardhito no vṛddhībhūtān pālayiṣyati kāryaṃ ca
T02mkarmviu:394: kariṣyati dravyasvāmī ca bhaviṣyati. kālagatānāṃ ca pitṛpiṇḍaṃ dāsyati.
T02mkarmviu:395: kulavaṃśaś ca cirasthitiko bhaviṣyati. imāni pañca sthānāni
T02mkarmviu:396: pratyāśaṃsamānā mātāpitaraḥ putram icchanti. naivam ācāryopādhyāyāḥ.
T02mkarmviu:397: kevalam eva kāruṇyaṃ puraskṛtya katham asyā nādikālapravṛttasya saṃsāracakrasya paryantaṃ kuryād iti. yathā bhagavatā vinaya uktam.
T02mkarmviu:398: upādhyāyasya śiṣye putrasaṃjñā bhavati. śiṣyasyāpy upādhyāye pitṛsaṃjñā
T02mkarmviu:399: bhavati. evam anyonyaniśritāḥ sukhino bhaviṣyanti. evam ācāryopādhyāyāḥ samasamā mātāpitṛbhiḥ. yathā cakravartisūtra (MKV 60) uktaṃ bhagavatā.
T02mkarmviu:400: kasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā cakravartī hastiratnāny aśvaratnāni ca pratilabhate. dīrgharātraṃ rājā cakravartī mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā svayaṃ vā skandhe vahati vā rathādibhir vāhayati vā. ācāryopādhyāyān svayaṃ vahati
T02mkarmviu:401: vāhayati vā. tasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā cakravartī hastyaśvaratnāni
T02mkarmviu:402: pratilabhate. anenāpi kāraṇena samasamā mātāpitara ācāryopādhyāyāś ca. api tv asty anyatra nānākaraṇam. gṛhasthānāṃ mātāpitṛ pravrajitāḥ pūjyāḥ.
T02mkarmviu:403: pravrajitānām ācāryopādhyāyā eva pūjanīyāḥ. yathā mahīśāsakā gotrāntarīyā
T02mkarmviu:404: vinaye 'rthotpattiṃ dhārayanti. yathāha bhagavān. na bhikṣavaḥ ācāryopādhyāyān anāpṛṣṭvā deśāntaraṃ gantavyam. kasmād. bhavati bhikṣavo jīvitāntarāyo bhavati brahmacaryāntarāyo bhavati pātracīvarāntarāyaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:405: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo maitrāyajño nāma sārthavāhaputra āsīd iti. etad evāvadānaṃ yathāvasthitaṃ vaktavyam. evam eva samasamā ācāryopādhyāyā mātāpitaraś ca. yathā coktaṃ bhagavatā. yo bhikṣavo mātāpitarau skandhena gṛhya jambudvīpaṃ paryaṭeta yogodvahanaṃ ca kuryāt caturṣu (MKV 61)
T02mkarmviu:406: dvīpeṣu hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ca dadyāt. evam api mātāpitroḥ pratyupakāro na kṛto bhavati. yaś ca punar buddhe prasādayet. dharme. saṃghe. pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu āryakānteṣu śīleṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. evaṃ mātāpitṝṇāṃ putraiḥ
T02mkarmviu:407: pratyupakāraḥ kṛto bhavati. tac ca sarvam ācāryopādhyāyāḥ kurvanti.
T02mkarmviu:408: yathāha bhagavān dakṣiṇāvibhaṅgasūtre. yathānanda pudgalaḥ pudgalam āgamya buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati yathoktāni ca śikṣāpadāni vaktavyāni. tenānanda pudgalena tasya pudgalasya na śakyaṃ
T02mkarmviu:409: pratikartum. yad idam abhivādanapratyutthānamātreṇaivam api prativiśiṣṭatarā ācāryopādhyāyā mātāpitṛbhyām. yathā ca mahākātyāyanenāvantiprabhṛtayaḥ paścimajanapadā abhiprasāditāḥ. yathā cāryamadhyandinena kāśmīrāyāṃ pañca nāgaśatani vinīya deśo 'bhiprasāditaḥ
T02mkarmviu:410: (MKV 62) anavataptasarasaś ca kuṅkumam ānīya kaśmīrāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam.
T02mkarmviu:411: tac cādyāpi lokopabhuktam. vihāraś ca kārito 'dyāpi ca tatraiva prativasanti. yathā āryagavāṃpatinā suvarṇabhūmyāṃ yojanaśataṃ janapado 'bhiprasāditaḥ. yathā ca pūrvavidehā āryapiṇḍolabhāradvājenābhiprasāditā vihārāś ca kāritā adyāpi tatraiva (MKV 63) prativasanti. yathā cāryamahendreṇa siṃhaladvīpe vibhīṣaṇaprabhṛtayo rākṣasāḥ samaye sthāpitā deśaś cābhiprasāditaḥ. yathā cādhyardhaśatake sūtra āryapūrṇena śūrpārake nagare pañcopāsakaśatāni (MKV 64) abhiprasāditāni. candanamālaś ca vihāraḥ
T02mkarmviu:412: kāritaḥ. yathā ca bhagavān pañcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ vihāyasā tatra gato janakāyaś cābhiprasāditaḥ. api ca kim ekaikasya bhikṣor nāmagrahaṇena
T02mkarmviu:413: kṛtena yato bhagavān parinirva ... ntar yaḥ kaścid vinīto bhikṣur vā
T02mkarmviu:414: bhikṣuṇī vopāsako vopāsikā vā sarve te bhikṣubhir eva vinītāḥ. yaś ca yenābhiprasāditaḥ sa tasyācāryopādhyāyāś ca eta .... ta bhagavān mātāpitaraḥ pañca sthānāni pratyanuśaṃsamānāḥ putram icchanti.
T02mkarmviu:415: ācāryopādhyāyās tu kāruṇyān nirvāṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti. anenāpi kāraṇena mātāpitṛbhya ācāryopādhyāyāḥ prativiśiṣṭatarā iti. ata evam āha bhagavān.
T02mkarmviu:416: mama bhikṣavo vacanaṃ śraddadhānair bhagavati paraḥ prasādaḥ kāryaḥ dharme saṃghe mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu paraḥ prasādaḥ kāryaḥ. tad vo bhaviṣyati dīrgharātraṃ hitāya sukhāyeti. idaṃ karma deśāntaravipākam.
T02mkarmviu:417: XXXIII. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ sukhito bhūtvā paścād duḥkhito bhavati. ucyate. ihaikatyo dānaṃ yācitaḥ samānaḥ pūrvaṃ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratijānīte pramudito dadāti. dattvā ca khalu pratisārī bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:418: sa yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. āḍhyeṣu mahādhaneṣu mahābhogeṣu
T02mkarmviu:419: kuleṣūpapadyate. paścāt tasya te bhogāḥ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti.
T02mkarmviu:420: sa paścād daridro bhavati. yathāryagopakaḥ. tena kila kakucchande
T02mkarmviu:421: samyaksaṃbuddhe bhikṣusaṃghasya godhenur dattā. sa paścāt parair garhito na sādhukṛteyaṃ datteti. tena cittaṃ pradūṣitam. sa yatra yatropapadyate
T02mkarmviu:422: tatra tatra mahādhano bhavati. paścāt tena cittapradoṣeṇa daridro bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:423: paścime bhave 'pi rājagṛhe nagare (MKV 66) 'nyatarasmin gṛhe pratyājātaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:424: tasya jāyamānasya mātā kālagatā. anena mātā māritā jāyamānena mūlanakṣatre jāto 'yaṃ mā nirmūlaṃ kulaṃ kariṣyaty amaṅgalo 'yam iti mātrā sārdhaṃ
T02mkarmviu:425: śmaśāne utsṛṣṭaḥ. tatrāpi ca mātur ekastanāt kṣīraṃ pragharati tenaiva
T02mkarmviu:426: puṇyānubhāvena. vivṛddhaś ca bhagavatāgatya pravrājitaḥ. etac ca sarvam
T02mkarmviu:427: anupūrveṇa bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ kathitam. evam anena pūrvaṃ kṣīradhenuḥ prasādajātena dattā paścād vipratisārī saṃvṛttaḥ. tasyedaṃ karmaphahm. yas tv asau pūrvakaś cittaprasādas tad evāsya mokṣabījam. yathā ca campāyāṃ
T02mkarmviu:428: mahānagaryām īśvaro gṛhapatiputraḥ. tena bhṛtyānāṃ haste sarvaṃ dhanaṃ caturdiśaṃ bāṇijyāya preṣitam. tac ca sarvaṃ deśāntaragataṃ vinaṣṭam. sa ca parakarmakaraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ
T02mkarmviu:430: XXXIV. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ duḥkhito bhūtvā paścāt sukhito bhavati. ucyate. ihaikatyo dānaṃ samādāya yācitaḥ samānaḥ pratijānīte. kṛcchreṇa dadāti. dattvā tu dānaṃ paścāt prītim utpādayati.
T02mkarmviu:431: sa yadā manuṣyeṣūtpadyate daridreṣu kuleṣūtpadyate. tasya paścāt te bhogā abhivṛddhiṃ gacchanti. atra cāniruddhasyāvadānaṃ vaktavyam. tena kila rājagṛhe (MKV 67) śyāmākataṇḍulabhaktam upariṣṭhasya pratyekabuddhasya
T02mkarmviu:432: piṇḍapāto dattaḥ. taddivasam eva rājñā tuṣṭenāṣṭau mahāgrāmā dattāḥ. tac ca paścimakaṃ dāridryam. yathā tasyaiva vyākaraṇaṃ pūrvāparāntake sūtre.
T02mkarmviu:433: yathā ca śrāvastyāṃ daridrapuruṣeṇa svajanaphalāni yācitvā kṣetraṃ nītāni karṣaṇārthe. tasya patnyā paragṛhe bhājanam ādhāya vrīhim ānīya bhaktaṃ siddham. atha bhagavatā śāriputramaudgalyāyanamahākāśyapasubhūtiprabhṛtayaḥ ete uktāḥ. amukasya gṛhapater gṛhe prathamaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ grahītavyam iti. te ca sarve
T02mkarmviu:434: yathānupūrvaṃ tatra gatāḥ. sarvaiś ca tasmād bhaikṣyaṃ labdham. atha paścād bhagavān api gataḥ. tayā striyā jātaprasādayā pariśiṣṭaṃ bhaktaṃ sarvaṃ bhagavato dattaṃ praṇidhānaṃ ca karoti. anena bhagavan kuśalamūlena
T02mkarmviu:435: mā me bhūyaḥ kadācid dāridryaṃ syād iti. tathāstv iti bhagavatā
T02mkarmviu:436: pratiśrutam. tadahar eva tasya mahānidhānaṃ prādurbhūtam. tac chrutvā rājāprasenajit tasmin gṛhe gataḥ. tenoktam. asmākaṃ pūrvarājabhis te
T02mkarmviu:437: dīnārāḥ sthāpitā iti. gṛhapatinā tasya tato gṛhyāñjalipūro dattaḥ. aṅgāraḥ
T02mkarmviu:438: saṃvṛttaḥ. rājñā bhūyo gṛhapater dattāḥ. suvarṇaṃ saṃvṛttam. athā rājā prasenajid vismayajātaḥ. gatvā bhagavato nivedayati. bhagavān āha.
T02mkarmviu:439: puṇyanirjātā gṛhapater na grāhyā. sarvaṃ ca tadānupūrveṇa kathitam. evam eṣa yadā dātā bhavati duḥkhena yācitaḥ samānaḥ pratijānīte. duḥkhena (MKV
T02mkarmviu:440: 68) dadāti dattvā ca cittaṃ prasādayati. tena hetunā pūrvaṃ daridro bhūtvā paścān mahādhano bhavati. idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ
T02mkarmviu:442: XXXV. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ ca paścāc ca sukhito
T02mkarmviu:443: bhavati. ucyate. ihaikatyo dānaṃ yācitaḥ sa prahṛṣṭaḥ pratijānīte prahṛṣṭo
T02mkarmviu:444: dadāti. dattvāpi ca prītimān bhavati. sa yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. āḍhyeṣu kuleṣūpapadyate mahādhaneṣu mahābhogeṣu. atra bhadrike nagare
T02mkarmviu:445: miṇḍhakaprabhṛtīnāṃ caturṇāṃ dānapatīnāṃ vipāko vaktavyaḥ. taiḥ kila tagaraśikhī pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍapātena pratipādilaḥ. atra vinayāvadānaṃ vaktavyam. idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ ca paścāc ca
T02mkarmviu:447: XXXVI. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ ca paścāc ca
T02mkarmviu:448: duḥkhito bhavati. ucyate. ihaikatyaḥ kalyāṇamitra virahito bhavati. sa dānaṃ na dadāti. na ca tena kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavati. sa yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate daridreṣu kuleṣūpapadyate. alpānnapānabhojaneṣu. yathā śrāvastyāṃ daridradārakasyāvadānaṃ varṇayanti. śrāvastyāṃ kila bhagavān
T02mkarmviu:449: piṇḍapātaṃ paryaṭati. tadā ca śrāvastyām ikṣudvādaśī nāma bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:450: bhagavatā cekṣūṇi labdhāni. anyatarasmin gṛhadvāre daridradārakas
T02mkarmviu:451: tiṣṭhati. sa bhagavantam ikṣūṇi yācati. bhagavataikaṃ dattam. sa (MKV 69)
T02mkarmviu:452: bhūyo yācatiḥ bhagavān āha. vatsa. ucyatām. necchāmīti te bhūyo dāsyāmīti.
T02mkarmviu:453: sa prāha. mayā bhagavan na kadācin necchāmīty uktaṃ pūrvam. bhagavān āha.
T02mkarmviu:454: vatsa. ucyatāṃ necchāmi bhagavan sarvāṇi dāsyāmīti. tenekṣulobhān necchāmīty uktam. bhagavatā sarvāṇi dattāni. athāryānandaḥ pṛcchati.
T02mkarmviu:455: bhagavan kim idam. bhagavān āha. na kadācid eṣa ānanda rūparasagandhasparśādīnāṃ tṛptapūrvo 'bhavat necchāmīti vā na kadācid
T02mkarmviu:456: uktapūrvam. tad etasya vacanaṃ tasya necchāmīti hetubhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati. āha
T02mkarmviu:458: necchāmīty eṣa vyāhāro na kadācid udīritaḥ kuto rūpāṇi śabdāś ca gandhāḥ sparśāś ca vai kutah.
T02mkarmviu:459: ity evaṃ prārthayann eṣa nityaṃ bhramati bāliśaḥ necchāmīti praharṣeṇa yaiṣā vāk samudīritā hetur alpecchatā yaiṣā sa evāsya bhaviṣyati.
T02mkarmviu:460: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pūrvaṃ ca paścāc ca duḥkhito bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:461: XXXVII. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgala āḍhyo bhavati matsarī.
T02mkarmviu:462: ucyate. ihaikatyenālpamātraṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati śīlavati pātrabhūte na tu punas tyāgacittam abhyastaṃ bhavati. yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. āḍhyeṣu kuleṣūpapadyate mahādhaneṣu mahābhogeṣu. tena dānaviśeṣeṇa yat tena punas tyāgacittam abhyastaṃ na bhavati sa tena karmaṇā matsarī bhavati. yathā śrāvastyāṃ (MKV 70) hilliśālagṛhapater avadānam. sa kila pūrvajanmani
T02mkarmviu:463: matsarī bhavati. atha tasya gṛhadvāre tagaraśikhī nāma pratyekabuddha
T02mkarmviu:464: āgataḥ. tasya bhikṣā dattā. tena dṛṣṭvādīyamānā tena kṣavaṇaye na ca
T02mkarmviu:465: bhikṣā dattā. sa ca pravrājitaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ. sa tena karmaṇā
T02mkarmviu:467: matsarī kālagataḥ. tasya dravyaṃ rājñā prasenajitāputrakaṃ gṛhītvā śatavarge āgame prasenajitsaṃyukteṣu rājopakīrṇakaṃ nāma sūtram.
T02mkarmviu:468: prasenajid bhagavataḥ kathayati. iha bhagavann agrakulikaḥ kālagataḥ.
T02mkarmviu:469: tasya mayāputrakaṃ svāpateyaṃ gṛhītam. bhagavān āha. katīyaṃ mahārāja gṛhapater dravyaṃ gṛhītam. sa āha. śataṃ bhagavan śatasahasrāṇāṃ yad āhataṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ dravyam aparimitam anāhatam. bhagavān āha. idaṃ tasya mahārāja saptamam aputrakaṃ dravyagrahaṇam. yat tena tagaraśikhī nāma pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍapātena pratipāditaḥ. tad asya karma parikṣīṇam. anyac ca kuśalamūlaṃ na kṛtam. tenādya prathamāyāṃ rātryāṃ mahāraurave narake pacyate. tatra bhagavān gāthā bhāṣate.
T02mkarmviu:470: dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ jātarūpaṃ gavāśvamaṇikuṇḍalam dāsakarmakarā bhṛtyā ye cānye anujīvinaḥ mriyamāṇasya nānveti nāpi ādāya gacchati.
T02mkarmviu:471: yat tena kṛtaṃ bhavati kalyāṇam atha pāpakam tad dhi tasya svakaṃ bhavati tac ca ādāya gacchati.
T02mkarmviu:474: gṛhe tiṣṭhati kāyo 'yaṃ śmaśāne priyabāndhavāḥ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ caiva gacchantam anugacchati.
T02mkarmviu:476: XXXVIII. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo daridro bhavati tyāgavān.
T02mkarmviu:477: ucyate. ihaikatyena pudgalena bahu dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati. tiryaggateṣu manuṣyeṣu ca duḥśīleṣv abrahmacāriṣu. punaḥ punas tyāgacittam abhyastam.
T02mkarmviu:478: sa yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate daridro bhavati tyāgavān tena dānābhyāsena. yat tu tenāpātrabhūteṣu dānaṃ dattaṃ tena daridraḥ. yathā śrāvastyāṃ tatra
T02mkarmviu:479: vinaye tantravāyasya nidānaṃ varṇayanti. sa tyāgavān daridraś ca. punaḥ punas tyāgacittam abhyastam. idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo daridro
T02mkarmviu:481: XXXIX. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgala āḍhyo bhavati tyāgavān.
T02mkarmviu:482: ucyate. ihaikatyena pudgalena bahu dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati śīlavatsu
T02mkarmviu:483: pātrabhūteṣu. punaḥ punas tyāgacittam abhyastaṃ bhavati. sa tena karmaṇā
T02mkarmviu:484: yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. āḍhyeṣu kuleṣūpapadyate mahādhaneṣu mahābhogeṣu.
T02mkarmviu:485: yat tu tena punaḥ punas tyāgacittam abhyastaṃ tena tyāgavān bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:486: yathānāthapiṇḍadena kila krakucchande samyaksaṃbuddhe jetavanaṃ niryātitam. vihāraś ca kāritaḥ. evaṃ kanakamunau samyaksaṃbuddhe kāśyape sarvārthasiddhe ca. bhūyaś ca maitreyasya suvarṇāstīrṇaṃ niryātayiṣyati.
T02mkarmviu:487: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgala āḍhyo bhavati tyāgavān.
T02mkarmviu:488: XL. katamasya pudgalasyāyuḥ kṣīṇaṃ na karma. ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo narakāc
T02mkarmviu:490: yamalokāc cyuto yamaloke upapadyate. devebhyaś cyuto deveṣūpapadyate.
T02mkarmviu:491: yathā varṣākārasya brāhmaṇasya punaḥ punaḥ kālagatasya markaṭopapattiḥ.
T02mkarmviu:492: yathā kāśmīrāyāṃ pūrvoktasya gṛhapateḥ punaḥ punaḥ paśūpapattiḥ. yathā ca śrāvastyāṃ kaścid daridraḥ kuṭumbī kālagataḥ. tasya gṛhadvāre balīvardo
T02mkarmviu:493: vraṇībhūtena skandhena tiṣṭhati. sa gṛha āsaktacittaḥ kuṭumbī tasya balīvardasya skandhe kṛmiḥ pratyājātaḥ. upapannamātraś ca kākena
T02mkarmviu:494: bhakṣitaḥ. punas tatraiva kṛmiḥ pratyājātaḥ. sa evaṃ saptakṛtva
T02mkarmviu:495: ekadivasena kālagataḥ. upapannamātraś ca kākena bhakṣitaḥ. yathā cāryamahāmaudgalyāyano magadheṣu bhaikṣyaṃ paryaṭamāno 'nyatamagṛhadvāram
T02mkarmviu:496: anuprāptaḥ. tasmiṃś ca gṛhe gṛhapatiḥ patnīsahito matsyamāṃsaprakāreṇa
T02mkarmviu:497: bhojanaṃ bhuṅkte. putreṇa paryaṅkagatena kṛṣṇā cāsya kukkurī puraḥ sthitā.
T02mkarmviu:498: sa tasya matsyā sthīni kṣipati. atḥa sa gṛhapatir mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ
T02mkarmviu:499: dṛṣṭvāha. gamyatām ārya nāsti kāścid atra yo bhikṣāṃ dāsyati. sa khalu saṃprasthitaḥ. taśmiṃś ca gṛhadvāre deśāntarābhyāgatāḥ puruṣā vidvāṃsaḥ
T02mkarmviu:500: pūrvasthitāḥ te taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ prāptāḥ. aho āścaryam ayaṃ nāma ṛddhimatām agryaḥ yena nandopanandau nāgarājānau vinītau vaijayantaś ca
T02mkarmviu:501: prāsādo vāmapādāṅguṣṭhena kampitaḥ śakro vismāpitaḥ trisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ nimeṣāntaracārī sa nāma bhikṣām adattvā visarjitaḥ. atha sthaviras teṣāṃ
T02mkarmviu:502: saṃvejanārtham āha. vatsa. naitad āścaryam. puruṣā ūcuḥ. atha kim anyad
T02mkarmviu:503: āścaryaṃ vismayakāraṇam. sa uvāca. ya eṣa gṛhapatir matsyamāṃsaprakārair bhojanaṃ (MKV 73) bhuṅkte eṣa matsyaḥ asya gṛhapateḥ pitā. tena yā eṣāsya
T02mkarmviu:504: gṛhasya pṛṣṭhataḥ puṣkariṇī ataḥ prabhūtamatsyān uddhṛtyoddhṛtya
T02mkarmviu:505: bhakṣitāḥ. sa kālagato 'traiva matsyaḥ pratyājātaḥ. sa eṣo 'nekaśa
T02mkarmviu:506: uddhṛtyoddhṛtya bhakṣyate. atraiva ca bhūyo bhūya upapadyate. yāpy eṣā kukkurī asyaiva gṛhapater mātā. etayā lobhadoṣeṇa na kiṃcid dānaṃ dattam.
T02mkarmviu:507: na ca śīlaṃ sevitam. kevalaṃ kulavaṃśārthaṃ dravyaṃ paripālitam. sātraiva gṛhe āsaktacittā kālagatā kukkurīṣu pratyājātā. kālagatā bhūyo bhūyo
T02mkarmviu:508: 'traivopapadyate. sarvāṃ ca rātrīṃ gṛhaṃ samantāt paryaṭati. mātra kaścit praviśed iti. atha yas tv eṣa putraḥ paryaṅke kṛtaḥ eṣo 'syā eva striyāḥ pracchannabhartā anena ca gṛhapatinā śrutam. eṣā te patnī
T02mkarmviu:509: parapuruṣavyāsaktā jāteti. sa eṣa gṛhapatir grāmāntara gamanavyapadeśena gṛhān niṣkrāntaḥ. eṣāpi strī parapuruṣeṇa saha śayitā. anena gṛhapatinā rātrāv āgamya puruṣo ghātitaḥ. so 'syām eva striyām āraktacittas tenaiva snehānubandhena kukṣav upapannaḥ. paśya vatsa yaḥ pitā caiva tasya sa maṃsāni bhakṣayati. yā mātā janitrī tasyā matsyakaṇtakāsthikāni dadāti.
T02mkarmviu:510: yaś ca śatruḥ kruddhena māritaḥ pāradārikaḥ taṃ paryaṅkena dhārayati. eṣa saṃsāradoṣo nirvedaḥ kāryaḥ. idam atrāścaryakāraṇam. atha sa bhikṣur
T02mkarmviu:511: mahāmaudgalyāyana etad evārthaṃ sarvaṃ paścimajanatāsaṃvejanārthaṃ ślokena
T02mkarmviu:513: pitur maṃsāni khādate mātuḥ kṣipati kaṇṭakān bhāryā jāraṃ ca poṣeti loko mohatamovṛtaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:514: ayaṃ pudgalo yasyāyuḥ kṣīṇaṃ na karma.
T02mkarmviu:515: XLI. katamasya pudgalasya karma kṣīṇaṃ nāyuḥ. ucyate. yaḥ pūrvaṃ sukhito
T02mkarmviu:516: bhūtvā paścād duḥkhito bhavati. pūrvaṃ yo duḥkhito bhūtvā paścāt sukhito
T02mkarmviu:517: bhavati. asya pudgalasya karma kṣīṇaṃ nāyuḥ.
T02mkarmviu:518: XLII. katamasya pudgalasya karma kṣīṇam āyuś ca. ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo narakāc cyutas tiryakṣūpapadyate. tiryagbhyaś cyuto yamaloke upapadyate.
T02mkarmviu:519: yamalokāc cyuto manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. tataś cyuto deveṣūpapadyate. yathā śrāvastyāṃ vaṇikputra udyānaṃ gataḥ puṣpahetoḥ patnīvacanenāśokavṛkṣam
T02mkarmviu:520: ārūḍhaḥ. sā ca vṛkṣaśākhā viśīrṇā. sa pāṣāṇaśilāyāṃ patitaḥ kālagataḥ.
T02mkarmviu:521: tatra mahājanakāyo rudati. atha bhikṣavo divāvihāraṃ gatāḥ. taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃvignā bhagavato nivedayanti. bhagavann aho anityatā. atrodyāne gṛhapatiputro bālo 'bhuktabhogo 'śokavṛkṣāt patitaḥ kālagatah. tatra mahājanakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ rauravasadṛśaś ca śabdaḥ śrūyate. bhagavān āha.
T02mkarmviu:522: eṣa eva bhikṣavaḥ gṛhapatiputraḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsamudre 'nyatarasmiṃ nāgakule
T02mkarmviu:523: upapannaḥ. sa tatra jātamātra eva strīsahitaḥ krīḍamāno garuḍenoddhṛtya
T02mkarmviu:524: bhakṣitaḥ. tatra nāgakanyā rudanti iha striyo rudanti. sa ca yasyāḥ striyā vacanenāśokavṛkṣam ārūḍhas tasyopary āghātaṃ kṛtavān. asyā doṣeṇāhaṃ vṛkṣam ārūḍhaḥ. kruddhaḥ kālagato narakeṣūpapannaḥ. asya pudgalasya karma
T02mkarmviu:526: XLIII. katamasya pudgalasya puṇyāni ca kṣīṇāni āyuś ca. (MKV 75) ucyate.
T02mkarmviu:527: yathā sa eva hilliśālī gṛhapatiḥ. yathā bhagavan āha. tasya punar mahārāja
T02mkarmviu:528: gṛhapates tac ca kuśalaṃ karma parikṣīṇam anyac ca na kṛtam. so 'dya
T02mkarmviu:529: prathamarātrīṃ raurave pacyate. yathā rājā prasenajid rājyād bhraṣṭo rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ. sa tatra purāṇamūlakapattrāṇi mukhe prakṣipya khādan
T02mkarmviu:531: pratyekabuddhapūrvas tasya [pūrvasya?] piṇḍapātasya vipākena. ayaṃ pudgalo yasyāyuś ca kṣīṇaṃ puṇyāni ca.
T02mkarmviu:532: XLIIIbis. katamasya pudgalasya nāyuḥ kṣīṇaṃ [na] karma. api tu kleśāḥ
T02mkarmviu:534: pratyekabuddhasya. ayaṃ pudgalo yasya nāyuḥ kṣīṇaṃ [na] karma. api tu kleśāḥ kṣīṇāḥ.
T02mkarmviu:535: XLIV. katamaḥ pudgalaḥ kāyena sukhī na cittena. ucyate. kṛtapuṇyaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ kāyena sukhī na cittena. yathā mahādhanabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayo rājā ca māndhātā. ayaṃ pudgalaḥ kāyena sukhī na cittena.
T02mkarmviu:536: XLV. katamaḥ pudgalaś cittena sukhī na kāyena. ucyate. yathārhann apuṇyaḥ cittena sukhī na kāyena. yathārya śoṇottaras tena kila pūrvajanmani pratyekabuddhasya snāyato gomayapiṇḍakaḥ kapikacchumiśraḥ snānārthaṃ dattaḥ. tena karma vipākena kuṣṭhena śarīraṃ viśīryati. tathā hi gāthā
T02mkarmviu:538: karmāṇi nūnaṃ balavattarāṇi karmabhyo vajrakalpebhyaḥ yatra vaśībhūto 'ham anubhavāmi duḥkhāni
T02mkarmviu:539: yathā ca jaṅghākāśyapaḥ. tena kila vārāṇasyāṃ pratyekabuddhasya
T02mkarmviu:540: pratiśrutam. bhaktaṃ dāśyāmīti. sa tasya mahatā pariśrameṇa kālātikramaṇe āsanne bhaktaṃ dattavān. sa tena karmaṇā paścime janmani vītarāgo 'pi
T02mkarmviu:541: bhūtvā pūrvāhṇe piṇḍapātaṃ paryaṭati. kālātikramaṇe āsanne kathaṃcid
T02mkarmviu:542: bhaktaṃ labhate. tathāsya jaṅghākāśyapa eva nāma. ayaṃ pudgalaś cittena
T02mkarmviu:544: XLVI. katamaḥ pudgalaḥ kāyena sukhī cittena ca. ucyate. arhan kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtapuṇyaḥ. yathā kaśmīrarājā dharmayaśaḥputro bakulaḥ. tathā hy asya
T02mkarmviu:545: siṃhanādaḥ. aśītir me āyuṣmanto varṣāṇi pravrajitasya na kadācid vyādhir bhūtapūrvaḥ. antataḥ śiro'rtimātram api. tena kila vārāṇasyāṃ
T02mkarmviu:546: gāndhikabaṇijā bhūtvā kakucchandaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saśrāvakasaṃgho glānabhaiṣajyenopanimantrito bhikṣuṇā cārhatā ekā harītakī gṛhītā. sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena nirābādhaḥ. ārogyaparamā lābhā uktā bhagavatā.
T02mkarmviu:547: yathā cāryāniruddhaḥ kathayati. tasya khalv āyuṣmantaḥ piṇḍapātasya vipākena saptakṛtvaḥ praṇīte trayastriṃśadevanikāye upapannaḥ saptakṛtvo manuṣyeṣu rājyaṃ kāritam. tasyaiva ca piṇḍapātasya vipākenārhatvaphalalābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ lābhī. tathā hi tasya bhagavatā durbhikṣe pañca bhikṣuśatāni dattāni. tasya puṇyānubhāvena sarveṣāṃ divyam anantabhaktaṃ prādurbhavati. ayaṃ pudgalaḥ kāyena sukhī cittena ca.
T02mkarmviu:548: XLVII. katamaḥ pudgalo na kāyena sukhī na cittena ca. akṛtapuṇyāḥ pṛthagjanā utsannakulavaṃśā vastrānnapānavirahitāḥ paragṛheṣu hiṇḍanti.
T02mkarmviu:549: tathā vyādhibhiḥ kuṣṭhakṣayakāsajvarapāṇḍurogadadrupāmādibhiḥ parigatā hastapādavikalāś cakṣurvihīnāś ca. ayaṃ pudgalo na kāyena sukhī na
T02mkarmviu:551: XLVIII. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo 'pāyeṣūpapanno 'bhirūpo
T02mkarmviu:552: bhavati prāsādikaḥ snigdhakāyaḥ snigdhacchavir nayanābhirāmo darśanīyaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:553: ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo rāgasamutthitena dauḥśīlyena samanvāgataḥ apāyeṣūpapadyate. yathā mayūraśukasārikākāraṇḍavacakravākaprabhṛtayaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:554: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo 'pāyeṣūpapanno 'bhirūpo bhavati prāsādikaḥ snigdhakāyaḥ snigdhacchavir nayanābhirāmo darśanīyaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:555: XLIX. tatra katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo 'pāyeṣūpapanno
T02mkarmviu:556: durvarṇo bhavati rūkṣakāyo ghoradarśanaḥ. ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo dveṣasamutthitena dauḥśīlyena samanvāgato 'pāyeṣūpapadyate. yathā
T02mkarmviu:559: L. tatra katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo 'pāyeṣūpapanno durgandho bhavati jihmendriyo 'vyaktendriyaḥ. ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo mohasamutthitena
T02mkarmviu:560: dauḥśīlyena samanvāgataḥ apāyeṣūpapadyate. (MKV 78) yathā chuchundarīkṛmyajagarayūkāmakṣikādayo yathā śarīre viṃśatikṛmijātayaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:561: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo 'pāyeṣūpapanno durgandho bhavati jihmendriyo 'vyaktendriyaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:562: LI. daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ. katame daśa. trividhaṃ kāyakarma. caturvidhaṃ
T02mkarmviu:563: vākkarma. trividhaṃ manaskarma. eṣāṃ daśānām akuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākena daśānāṃ bāhyānāṃ bhāvānām abhivṛddhir bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:564: LII. prāṇātipātasyākuśalakarmapathasya vipākena pṛthivyā ojaś ca tejaś
T02mkarmviu:565: cāntardhīyate. tasyaiva ca karmaṇo vipākenālpāyur bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:566: LIII. adattādānasyākuśalasya karmapathasya vipākena pṛthivyām aśaniśukaśalabhamūṣikakīṭaprabhṛtayaḥ sasyaghāsakā utpadyante. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākena bhogavyasanam adhigacchati.
T02mkarmviu:567: LIV. kāmamithyācārasyākuśalasya karmapathasya vipākena pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇadarbhādīni durgandhīni prādurbhavanti. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākena
T02mkarmviu:568: saṃpannagṛhāvāsaṃ praviśanti. atrāvadānaṃ śvabhrapadasya susudhī dārikā kāsirājñaḥ patnī devāvataraṇe kālodayinaḥ pūrvajanmany avadānaṃ vaktavyam.
T02mkarmviu:572: LVI. piśunavacanasyākuśalasya karmapathasya vipākena pṛthivyāṃ śarkarakaṭhallyādīni duḥkhasaṃsparśādīni prādurbhavanti. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākena jātivyasanā mitravyasanā bhavanti bhedyaḥ parivāraś ca bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:573: LVIl. paruṣavacaso 'kuśalakarmapathasya vipākena pāṃśurajodhūlivātavṛṣṭyādīni prādurbhavanti. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākenāmanojñaśabdaśravaṇadarśanāny anubhavanti.
T02mkarmviu:577: LIX. abhidhyāyā akuśalasya karmapathasya vipākena vrīhiyavagodhūmādīnāṃ sasyānāṃ tuṣapalālādīni prādurbhavanti. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākena
T02mkarmviu:579: LX. vyāpādasyākuśalakarmapathasya vipākena prabhūte upte niṣphalaṃ sasyaṃ
T02mkarmviu:580: bhavati. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākena pratikūladarśano bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:581: LXI. mithyādṛṣṭer akuśalasya karmapathasya vipākena tiktakaṭukabhāvāny (MKV 80) api picumandakoṣātakīviṣatiktālābuprabhṛtīni
T02mkarmviu:582: prādurbhavanti. mithyādṛṣṭer akuśalasya karmapathasya vipākena nāstikyavādī bhavati. ucchedadṛṣṭiḥ lokāyatādiṣu ca śāstreṣu prasādo bhavati. yathā padāśvasya rājaputrasya yaḥ kumārakāśyapena śvetikāyāṃ
T02mkarmviu:583: vinīto lokāyatikaḥ. yathā yathā sattvā imān daśākuśalān karmapathān
T02mkarmviu:584: bhāvayanti tathaiṣāṃ daśānāṃ bāhyānāṃ bhāvānām atīva prādurbhāvo bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:585: anenaiva ca kāraṇena mahāsaṃvartakalpe bhaviṣyati samayo 'nāgate 'dhvani
T02mkarmviu:586: yat tilā bhaviṣyanti tilapiṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati tailaṃ na bhaviṣyati ikṣur bhaviṣyati ikṣuraso na bhaviṣyati guḍo na bhaviṣyati. na khaṇḍaṃ bhaviṣyati na śarkarā bhaviṣyanti. gāvo bhaviṣyanti kṣīraṃ bhaviṣyati dadhi bhaviṣyati navanītaṃ na bhaviṣyati na ghṛtaṃ na gḥrtamaṇḍo
T02mkarmviu:587: bhaviṣyati. evam anupūrveṇa sarveṇa sarve rasā antardhāsyanti.
T02mkarmviu:592: udārāṇi ca vastrāṇi pratilabhate. udāraṃ kulaṃ pratilabhate. udāraṃ vayaḥ pratilabhate. udāraṃ svaraṃ pratilabhate. udārāṃ pratibhānatāṃ pratilabhate. udārāṃ śraddhāṃ pratilabhate. udāraṃ śīlaṃ pratilabhate.
T02mkarmviu:593: udāraṃ śrutaṃ pratilabhate. udāraṃ tyāgaṃ pratilabhate. udārāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhate. udārāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhate. asyoddānam.
T02mkarmviu:594: deśavastrakularūpasvarapratibhānatāśraddhāśīlaśrutatyāgān smṛtimān bhavati prajñāvān tathāgatasya buddhaprasādaṃ kṛtvāñjaliṃ labhate dhīraḥ (MKV 83)
T02mkarmviu:595: saprajña udāram āśravakṣayam. uktaṃ ca sūtre. ye kecid ānanda caityacaryāṃ caramāṇāḥ prasannacittāḥ kālaṃ kariṣyanti. yathā bhallo nikṣiptaḥ
T02mkarmviu:596: pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhate evaṃ kāyasya bhedāt svargeṣūpapatsyanti.
T02mkarmviu:597: LXIII. katame daśānuśaṃsās tathāgatacaityavandanāyām. ucyate. abhirūpo
T02mkarmviu:598: bhavati. susvaraḥ. ādeyavākyaḥ. pariṣadam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pariṣadam
T02mkarmviu:599: āvarjayati priyo bhavati devamanuṣyāṇām. maheśākhyo bhavati. maheśākhyaiḥ samāgamo sattvaiḥ bhavati. buddhair buddhaśrāvakaiś ca samāgamo bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:600: mahābhogo bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti. ime daśānuśāṃsās tathāgatacaityavandanāyāḥ.
T02mkarmviu:601: LXIV. katame daśānuśaṃsāś chattrapradānasya. ucyate. chattrabhūto bhavati lokasya. anavatapto bhavati kāyena anavatapto bhavati cittena.
T02mkarmviu:602: ādhipatyasaṃvartanīyaṃ cānena karma kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitam. punaḥ punaś ca
T02mkarmviu:603: rājā bhavati cakravartī. maheśākhyo bhavati. maheśākhyaiḥ sattvaiḥ samāgamo bhavati buddhair buddhaśrāvakaiś ca samāgamo bhavati. mahābhogo
T02mkarmviu:605: a) atra gaṅgāsaṃtāre bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhasya stūpe dattasya
T02mkarmviu:606: chattrasya vipāko varṇyate. yathā cāryasundaranando vyākaroti.
T02mkarmviu:607: jentākasya ca snānena tālasyālepanena ca ekacchattrapradānāc ca prāptā me suvarṇavarṇatā.
T02mkarmviu:608: evamādi chattrapradānasya vipāko vaktavyaḥ. āha ca.
T02mkarmviu:610: yad dhāryate pravaradaṇḍam udārarūpaṃ kodaṇḍadāmaparimaṇḍitavastikośam chattraṃ viśālam amalaṃ śaśimaṇḍalābham chattrapradānajanitena jagaddharasya.
T02mkarmviu:611: śrīcihnabhūtaṃ maṇihemadaṇḍam paṭojjvalaṃ kāñcanam ātapatram yad dhāryate mūrdhni narādhipasya chattrapradānena jagaddharasya ime daśānuśaṃsaś chattrapradānasya.
T02mkarmviu:612: LXV. katame daśānuśaṃsā ghaṇṭāpradānasya. ucyate. abhirūpo bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:613: susvaro bhavati. manojñabhāṣī bhavati. kalaviṅkarutabhāṣī bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:614: ādeyavākyo bhavati. nityaṃ saṃprahāryajāto bhavati. punaḥ punar ānandaṃ
T02mkarmviu:615: śabdaṃ śṛṇoti. svargeṣūpapadyate. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
T02mkarmviu:616: a) yathā viśākhayā mṛgāramātrā bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ. kathaṃ mama prāsāde nityaṃ kālaṃ pañcāṅgikaṃ tūryaṃ sadaiva vadet. bhagavān (MKV 88) āha.
T02mkarmviu:617: sarvasvaropetāṃ ghaṇṭām āropaya. evaṃ te nityaṃ kālaṃ prāsāde pañcāṅgikatūryaśabdo bhaviṣyati. anavadyaś ca. ime daśa guṇā
T02mkarmviu:619: LXVI. katame daśa guṇā vastrapradānasya. ucyate. ślakṣṇachavir bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:620: snigdhacchavir bhavati. na carajaś cailaṃ kāye śliṣyati.
T02mkarmviu:621: hrīrapatrāpyasaṃpanno bhavati priyadarśano bhavati prabhūtavastro bhavati lābhī ca bhavati sūkṣmāṇāṃ vastrāṇām āstaraṇānām. mahābhogo bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:622: svargeṣūpapadyate kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti. yathoktaṃ bhagavatā devatāsūtre.
T02mkarmviu:623: vastraprado bhavati varṇavān. ime daśa guṇānuśaṃsā vastrapradānasya.
T02mkarmviu:624: LXVII. katame daśānuśaṃsā āsanapradānasya. ucyate. gurusthānīyo bhavati lokasya. priyadarśano bhavati. prāsādiko bhavati. paṇḍitajanābhigamyo
T02mkarmviu:625: bhavati. yaśaḥ kīrtiś cāsya loke prathitā bhavati. sukhasaumanasyabahulo
T02mkarmviu:626: bhavati. svadeśe 'bhiramati. āsanair avaikalyaṃ bhavati. upasthāyakair avaikalyaṃ bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti. ime daśa guṇā āsanapradānasya.
T02mkarmviu:627: LXVIII. katame daśānuśaṃsā bhājanapradānasya. ucyate. bhājanabhūto bhavati guṇānāṃ snigdhasaṃtatir bhavati. na ca tṛṣābahulo bhavati. tṛṣārtasya pānīyaṃ prādurbhavati. na ca preteṣūpapadyate. bhājanair avaikalyaṃ bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
T02mkarmviu:629: LXIX. katame daśānuśaṃsā bhojanapradānasya. ucyate. balavān bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:630: varṇavān bhavati. sukhito bhavati. pratibhānavān bhavati. dīrghāyur
T02mkarmviu:631: bhavati. mahājanābhigamyo bhavati. priyadarśano bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
T02mkarmviu:632: a) yathoktaṃ bhagavatā vaiśālyāṃ siṃhasya rājaputrasya. dadan siṃha priyo
T02mkarmviu:633: bhavati. santo janā bhajanti. kalyāṇaśabdo bhavati. viśāradaḥ parṣadam avagāhati. kālagato
T02mkarmviu:635: te tatra nandanti ramanti ca modayanti samarpitāḥ kāmaguṇeṣu pañcasu kṛtvā hi vākyam amitasya tāyino modanti te sugatavarasya śrāvakāḥ.
T02mkarmviu:637: svargeṣūpapadyate kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti. āha ca.
T02mkarmviu:638: nānārasavyañjanasupraṇītaṃ kāle śubhaṃ gandharasopapannam dadāti yaḥ pātram avekṣya dānaṃ sadāryasaṃghasya guṇān vicintya āyuś ca varṇaṃ ca yaśo balaṃ ca saṃprāpya bhogān pratibhāṃ sukhaṃ ca divīha caiva prathitottamaśrīḥ sukhāt sukhaṃ yāti vimokṣam ante.
T02mkarmviu:640: LXX. katame daśa guṇā yānapradānasya. ucyate. sukumāracaraṇo bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:641: snpratiṣṭhitacaraṇo bhavati. mārgaklamatho na bhavati. na ca bahvamitro
T02mkarmviu:642: bhavati. punaḥ punaḥ ṛddhipādān pratilabhate. hastyaśvādibhir yānair avaikalyaṃ bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
T02mkarmviu:643: a) yathā coktaṃ devatāsūtre. yānadaḥ sukhito bhavati. yo dadāty upānahau.
T02mkarmviu:644: yathā coktam abhidharme cakravartisūtre. katamasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā cakravartī hastyaśvādīni vāhanāni pratilabhate. dīrgharātraṃ rājā cakravartī mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vopādhyāyaṃ vā skandhena vahati vā vāhayati
T02mkarmviu:645: vā. hastyaśvādibhiḥ śivikāyānair vā vahati vā. durgasaṃkramaṃ vā karoti.
T02mkarmviu:646: setubandhaṃ karoti. upānahapradānāni vā dadāti. kāruṇyena mahāṭavyāṃ sārtham atikrāmayati. tasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā cakravartī hastyaśvādīni
T02mkarmviu:650: LXXI. katame daśa guṇāḥ pratiśrayapradānasya. ucyate. rājā bhavati prādeśikaḥ. rājā bhavati māṇḍalikaḥ. rājā bhavati jambudvīpādhipatiḥ. rājā bhavati dvīpadvayādhipatiḥ. rājā bhavati dvīpatrayādhipatiḥ. rājā bhavati caturdvīpādhipatiś cakravartī. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate.
T02mkarmviu:653: bhagavati konāgamunau saṃghārāme ca niveśe sakhyas trayo vayaṃ sa vihāraṃ dadau pūrvam.
T02mkarmviu:654: etā gāthā sumedhāyāḥ. dharmadinnā ca bhikṣuṇī viśākhyā ca mṛgāramātā.
T02mkarmviu:655: tābhiḥ pūrvaṃ daridrastrībhiś catvāri kāṣṭhāni nikhanya kāśakaṭakam upari dattvā bhagavān konāgamunir buddho nimantritaḥ. sa tatra bhikṣubhiḥ
T02mkarmviu:656: sārdhaṃ muhūrtaṃ viśrāntaḥ. tābhiś cittāni prasāditāni. tena karmaṇā śatasahasraṃ vārān deveṣūpapannāḥ. aparimitāni cakravartirāṣṭrāny anubhūtāni. sumedhāgāthāś cāsminn arthe sarvā vistareṇa pratyekam
T02mkarmviu:658: LXXII. katame daśa guṇāḥ pānakapradānasya. ucyate. sarvendriyasaṃpanno
T02mkarmviu:660: bhavati. na ca tṛṣābahulo bhavati. tṛṣitasya (MKV 98) pānīyaṃ
T02mkarmviu:661: prādurbhavati. na ca preteṣūpapadyate. mahābhogaś ca bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:662: svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti. yathā cāha.
T02mkarmviu:663: manojñavarṇaṃ rasagandhayuktaṃ sarvendriyaprītivivardhanaṃ ca akālikaṃ satpuruṣapraśastaṃ dadāti saṃghāya tu pānakaṃ yaḥ sakṛtpipāsāvigato viśoko rasān pradhānāñ caturo 'nubhūya
T02mkarmviu:664: jagac ca saddharmarasena tarpya tṛṣākṣayaṃ yāti sukhaṃ sukhena.
T02mkarmviu:666: LXXIII. katame daśa guṇā mālāpradānasya. ucyate. mālābhūto bhavati lokasya. kāyād daurgandhyam apaiti saugandhyaṃ prādurbhavati.
T02mkarmviu:668: sarvajanapriyo bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
T02mkarmviu:670: mālyaṃ vicitraṃ pravaraṃ sugandhaṃ praharṣaṇaṃ prītikaraṃ narāṇām prasannacitto munidhātugarbhe tathāgatebhyaś ca dadāti yo vai sa divyamālyābharaṇojjvalāṅgaḥ śrīmat sukhaṃ prāpya divīha caiva bodhyaṅgadāmapratibhūṣitātmā mokṣaṃ paraṃ yāti guṇāgragandhaḥ.
T02mkarmviu:671: b) tathānyatarasya daridragṛhapater duhitā. sā khalu dvāre sthitā janapadaṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitaṃ paśyati. utsave ramamāṇam. sā pitaram āha.
T02mkarmviu:672: mām apy alaṃkuruṣveti. pitāha. kuto 'smākaṃ daridrāṇām alaṃkāraḥ. eṣa janapadaḥ kṛtapuṇyo 'nekaśo buddhe bhagavati kṛtādhikāraḥ. tena ca karmaṇā
T02mkarmviu:673: karṇesumanasya sthavirasyāvadānaṃ vistaraśas tasyoktam. evam alpo 'pi
T02mkarmviu:674: bhagavati kṛtaḥ prasādo mahāphalo bhavati. tayā pitātīvoparodhitaḥ prayaccha mama kiṃcid eṣo 'grato vihāraḥ atra bhagavataḥ pūjām
T02mkarmviu:675: upariṣyāmīti. tena duḥkhārtena vibhave 'vidyamāne palālamayīṃ mālāṃ kṛtvā
T02mkarmviu:676: dattā. sā tāṃ palālamayīṃ mālāṃ gṛhya buddhapratimāyāḥ śirasi dattvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya āha. bhagavann anena kuśalamūlena saṃsāre saṃsaratyā mā
T02mkarmviu:677: bhūyaḥ dāridryaṃ syād iti. tasyāḥ prasādajātāyās tad ahar eva mānuṣyaṃ
T02mkarmviu:678: strībhāvam atikrāntaṃ divyaṃ rūpaṃ prādurbhūtam. tadviṣayaprativāsinā ca rājñāgradevī sthāpitā. kālagatā deveṣūpapannā. paścime 'pi ca bhave campāyām agrakulikasya (MKV 100) duhitā pratyājātā paramakalyāṇī sauvarṇā cāsyā mālā sarvaratnamaṇḍitā śirasi sahasaiva prādurbhūtā. mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vismayajātābhyāṃ mālinīty evāsyā nāma kṛtam. yadā ca bhagavān
T02mkarmviu:679: abhisaṃbuddho rājagṛhāc campām anuprāptaḥ. sā copasaṃkrāntā. tasyāś ca bhagavatā dharmadeśanā kṛtā pravrajitā cārhantī saṃvṛttā. sāha cittotpādād evāsyā mā me bhūyo mālā bhavatv ity antarhitā. tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vismayaprāptā devatā gāthām anugāyate yathāha.
T02mkarmviu:680: dattvā tu palālamayīṃ mālāṃ sā mālinī sugatasya caitye varakanakaratnamālāṃ lebhe bodhyaṅgamālāṃ
T02mkarmviu:682: LXXIV. katame daśa guṇā muktapuṣpapradānasya. ucyate. puṣpabhūto bhavati lokasya. ghrāṇendriyaṃ viśudhyati. kāyadaurgandhyaṃ samapaiti. saugandhyaṃ
T02mkarmviu:683: prādurbhavati. daśa diśaḥ śīlagandhaḥ khyātiṃ gacchati. abhigamanīyaś ca bhavati. lābhī ca bhavati (MKV 101) iṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
T02mkarmviu:684: a) atra karṇesumanasya pūrvajanmani prasāde jāte ekaikapuṣpapradānasya
T02mkarmviu:685: vipāko vaktavyaḥ. yathā sa eva āha.
T02mkarmviu:686: ekapuṣpapradānena aśītikalpakoṭayaḥ durgatiṃ nābhijānāmi buddhapūjāya tat phalam.
T02mkarmviu:688: LXXV. katame daśa guṇā dīpapradānasya. ucyate. pradīpabhūto bhavati lokasya. māṃsacakṣur naśyati. divyacakṣuḥ prādurbhavati. avidyāndhakāraṃ
T02mkarmviu:689: vidhamati. jñānāloka utpadyate. kuśalākuśalān dharmān kṣipraṃ prajñayā
T02mkarmviu:690: pratividhyati. saṃsāre saṃsarato 'vidyāndhakāro na bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
T02mkarmviu:691: a) yathā coktam abhidharme cakravartisūtravibhaṅge. kasya karmaṇo vipākena
T02mkarmviu:692: rājā cakravartī maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhate. dīrgharātraṃ rājñā cakravartinā
T02mkarmviu:693: dīpapradānāni pradattāni. pradīpaikadānāni ca. andhakāre ratnapradīpā dhāritā. ye cakṣuṣmantas te samaviṣamāṇi rūpāṇi paśyantu. āha ca.
T02mkarmviu:694: buddhapraśastaṃ labhate ca cakṣuś cakṣus tu yasyottamahetubhūtam lokāvabhāsaṃ bhavatīha rūpam pradīpadānena jagaddharasya.
T02mkarmviu:695: tejo'dhiko nārtham udīkṣaṇīyaḥ atīva tuṣṭaḥ śubhakarmadarśī
T02mkarmviu:696: saṃprāpya saukhyaṃ divi ceha caiva viśuddhacakṣuḥ praśamaṃ paraiti.
T02mkarmviu:697: atrāryāniruddhasya dīpe divyacakṣur ṛṣīṇāṃ ca cakṣūtpāṭanamokṣāyaṇe
T02mkarmviu:698: vaktavyam. yathā dīpamālāpradānena dīpaṅkareṇa buddhatvaṃ prāptam. yā ca śrāvastyāṃ cakṣuvikalena pradīpamālā kāritā. saprasādo jātaḥ. praṇidhānaṃ
T02mkarmviu:699: kṛtavān. utthitasya cāsya yathā paurāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ saṃvṛttam. ime daśa guṇā
T02mkarmviu:701: LXXVI. katame daśa guṇā gandhapradānasya. ucyate. gandhabhūto bhavati lokasya. ghrāṇendriyaṃ viśudhyati. kāyadaurgandhyam apaiti. saugandhyaṃ
T02mkarmviu:702: prādurbhavati. daśa diśaḥ śīlagandhaḥ pravāti. abhigamanīyo bhavati. lābhī ca bhavati iṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate.
T02mkarmviu:704: a) yathoktam abhidharme cakravartisūtre. kasya karmaṇo vipākena rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnasya romakūpebhyaḥ śarīrād gandho nirgacchati.
T02mkarmviu:705: tadyathā gandhasamudgakasya. dīrgharātraṃ tayā striyā caityagarbhagṛheṣu gandhopalepanāni dattāni. surabhīṇi ca puṣpāṇi dhūpaś ca dattāḥ. stūpeṣu ca gandhasnāpanāni kṛtāni. tasya karmaṇo vipākena rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnasya śarīrād evaṃrūpo gandho nirgacchati. tadyathā
T02mkarmviu:707: LXXVII. katame daśa guṇāḥ pravrajyāyāḥ. ucyate.
T02mkarmviu:708: putrabhāryaduhitṛdhanatṛṣṇāsya na bhavati. kāmasya parigraho na bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:709: araṇyavāse prītiṃ pratilabhate. buddhagocaraṃ sevate. bālagocaraṃ
T02mkarmviu:710: vivarjayati. durgatigamanīyān dharmān vivarjayati. sugatigamanīyān dharmān sevate. devā asya spṛhayanti. nityaṃ sugatavacane pravrajyāṃ pratilabhate.
T02mkarmviu:712: LXXVIII. katame daśa guṇā araṇyavāsasya. ucyate. saṃgaṇikā vivarjayati.
T02mkarmviu:713: pravivekaṃ sevate. dhyānālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhavati. na ca bahukarmakṛtyatāṃ
T02mkarmviu:714: prāpnoti. buddhānāṃ smṛtiṃ yāti. prītisukhasaumanasyaṃ kāyo na jahāti.
T02mkarmviu:715: antarāyāś ca na bhavanti. brahmacaryasya alpāyāsena samādhim adhigacchati.
T02mkarmviu:716: uddiṣṭaṃ cāsya padavyañjanaṃ na naśyati. yathāśrutānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vistareṇārtham ājānati. ime daśa guṇā araṇyavāsasya.
T02mkarmviu:717: LXXIX. katame daśa guṇāḥ paiṇḍapātikatve. ucyate. caṅkramo 'sya upārjito
T02mkarmviu:718: bhavati. gocaro 'sya prahato bhavati. māno 'sya nihato (MKV 105) bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:719: ātmānaṃ lābhena yojayati. parān puṇye pratiṣṭhāpayati. śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayati. paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhavati. sabrahmacāriṇām upaghātaḥ kṛto na bhavati. nīcacittam upasthāpitaṃ bhavati.
T02mkarmviu:720: piṇḍapātaparacittasya bhikṣoḥ sarvā diśo 'pratikūlā bhavanti gamanāya. ime daśa guṇāḥ piṇḍapātikatve.
T02mkarmviu:721: LXXX. daśa vaiśāradyāni. katamāni daśa. ucyate. viśārado grāmaṃ praviśati.
T02mkarmviu:722: viśārado grāmān niṣkrāmati. viśāradaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte. viśāradaḥ pariṣadi dharmaṃ deśayati. viśāradaḥ saṃghamadhyam avatarati. viśārada ācāryopādhyāyān upasaṃkrāmati. viśārado maitracittaḥ śiṣyān anuśāsti.
T02mkarmviu:723: viśāradaś cīvarapiiiḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān paribhuṅkte. grāhyaṃ cāsya vaco bhavati. imāni daśa vaiśāradyāni.
